parameters: \n<Sato> Welcome to the junkyard located in the northwest of Mikura City.
As ordinary citizens, you probably haven't been to this place, have you?
\n<Sato> Let me briefly introduce you.
In the middle of the junkyard is the waste processing station\|
>地图镜头 : 固定看向 : 事件[3]
\n<Sato>The southwest of the junkyard is the slum area of Mikura City.
>地图镜头 : 固定看向 : 事件[4]
>地图镜头 : 解除固定看向
\n<Sato>Yamashita and I both came here during the first week of the virus outbreak
With ample resources, the secret support and work plans of the corporation\|
\n<Sato>Yamashita has been assigned to carry out a mission in the safe zone.
And I wasn't lucky enough, I was assigned to the slum area.
\n<Sato> While Yamashita is fooling the safe zone residents
I have also become the de facto leader of the slum area here\|
\n<Sato>But the problem is, those guys in the slums are too low-level—
Vicious and cowardly, only thinking about clinging to life with no desire for exploration.
\n<Sato>For this group of lowly guys,
there’s essentially no difference between life before and after the virus outbreak.
So they simply don’t want to go on an adventure...
\n<Sato>As a result, Yamashita has already organized several exploration teams, including mine.
I'm struggling to even form a team on my end.
A few rare explorers have defected to Yamashita's side; you might have seen them.
Speaking of which, it seems like the explorers from the slum area killed Inukai.
It seems that the first time I met the explorer\..\..was in the bar\|
\n<Sato>However, as Yamashita’s organization keeps growing, his mundane tasks are increasing too.
I’ve probably been too busy playing the big brother lately, neglecting the main mission.
\n<Sato>So, I also turned his subordinate Inukai against him.
Made him realize the urgency of the situation...
It turns out Inukai not only helped him control the shopping district,
but was also conducting some simple experiments on the captive zombies.
\n<Sato>I guess Yamashita has probably been busy at the warehouse on the shopping street these past few days.
Because the experimental data over there still needs to be organized by him.\|
\n<Sato>Getting back to your mission,
it's when Yamashita is busy with the data at the shopping street.
Get a head start by exploring the intel stored in the junkyard.
>地图镜头 : 固定看向 : 事件[3]
\n<Sato>The information is that, on the surface, it's just a garbage disposal station,
but actually, it's in that building of the Mikura property facility.
>地图镜头 : 解除固定看向
\n<Sato>As for how to get in, that's up to you now.
As I mentioned earlier, I hardly have any explorers under my command.
\n<Sato>I won't take the risk to explore myself.
I can only entrust you to gather clues in this junkyard.
Go inside again to gather the intel.
\n<Sato>I will be waiting for you in the slums.
After obtaining the intelligence, bring it along with this certificate.
Only then will you be granted access to the slum area.
\n<Sato> No time to waste, while Yamashita is still dealing with the stuff on the shopping street
Hurry and seize the information first!
\n<Sato>Let's meet in the slums later.
Phone.AddMessage("avabook", "Main Quest-10", 89)

[1], this mission is no joke...

\n<\n[2]>Inoshita, if you're scared

You need a key to open.

the shopping street near the Yamashita Forest to report."
This handwriting belongs to the Wild Dogs.
"We're gathering at the warehouse.
If you return, the key is in the car."
"The car is parked under the monument. Take what you need and hurry."
"I guess there's nothing much to discuss at our gathering this time."

"I guess there's nothing much to discuss at our gathering this time."

In Memory of the Builders of Mikura City
The junkyard seems to be the center of old Mikura City.
A car that still looks in good condition.
A set of keys is placed on the driver's seat of the car.
After breaking the window, you can get...
Obtained the key
Now, the gate to the junkyard should be open.

\n<Slum Guard>That's right, I'm going to search you for any weapons of mass destruction.
What is massive destructive power? In short, if I say it is, then it is.\|
\n<Slum Guard>This woman looks very suspicious...
